Usage: floe rbac generate [OPTIONS]

  Generate RBAC manifests from configuration (FR-060).

  Reads the manifest.yaml configuration and generates Kubernetes RBAC manifests
  including ServiceAccounts, Roles, RoleBindings, and Namespaces.

  Output files:     target/rbac/namespaces.yaml
  target/rbac/serviceaccounts.yaml     target/rbac/roles.yaml
  target/rbac/rolebindings.yaml

  Examples:     $ floe rbac generate     $ floe rbac generate --config
  platform.yaml --output deploy/rbac     $ floe rbac generate --dry-run

Options:
  -c, --config PATH  Path to manifest.yaml configuration file.
  -o, --output PATH  Output directory for generated manifests.
  --dry-run          Show what would be generated without writing files.
  -h, --help         Show this message and exit.
